title: 外國報導好似唔少已經知道係暫緩唔係撒回

replies.msg:
今日睇economist 有篇關於77既短新聞

There were more marches in Hong Kong, though on a smaller scale that in recent weeks. Tens of thousands of protesters gathered in areas frequented by Chinese tourists, in an attempt to explain to mainlanders why there has been such disquiet over a bill that would have allowed extradition from the territory to China. The bill has been mothballed.

之後NYT好似搞錯咗比人屌到傻
BTW近排the times報得好貼
